name: Falafel
description: Falafel Coin is a futuristic indie blockchain gaming company that will allow you to mine the token while playing! Yes, earn while you play. We will be introducing our very own ‘Play to Earn’ style of gaming which will give players the opportunity to earn FALAFEL for free by simply playing and engaging with our games and their unique built-in features. Our games won't ask players for any deposits, payments and not even transaction fees, this is totally free. Falafel Coin is also the first charitable Middle Eastern token that brings automated rewards to its holders along with the unique Blockchain Gaming technology.
